name: Quarter (Brandon Bishop)
description:
Windows 64 bit.

This is a collect and hide horror game.

Your objective is to collect 8 quarters to win. It's extremely challenging if you love the challenge. First 10 people to finish the game and send a screenshot will be included in the game extras as a bonus.

This project took me awhile and i'd love to share it with everyone.  Made with Unreal Engine 4. I've shared the beta version with my friends and they had a blast playing it. I know you will too.

if you have any questions feel free to contact me @ brandonbishopcontact@gmail.com
